description:
"Helix" has been renewed for Season 2 on Syfy. The tense, mysterious series will return in 2015 with 13 new episodes.Syfy电视台宣布续订《双螺旋》第二季。这部集紧张、悬疑为一体的美剧将会在2015年回归，仍然是13集。

"Helix has built one of our most loyal and consistent audiences in its first season on Syfy," says Syfy executive vice president Bill McGoldrick in a statement. "The incredibly talented writing and producing team have crafted a thriller that consistently delivered suspense, twists and high quality drama. We look forward to growing this passionate audience in what promises to be an even more memorable second season."“《双螺旋》这部美剧第一季就给我们电视台吸引了一批忠诚的观众，”Syfy电视台副执行总监Bill McGoldrick说。“这部集天才剧本和制作团队为一体的美剧给观众们打造了一个悬疑、紧张、转折、高潮接连不断的高质量剧集。我们都很看好这部剧的潜力，并且相信这部剧的第二季将会更加让人记忆深刻。”

The "Helix" Season 1 finale airs Friday, March 28 at 10 p.m. on Syfy.《双螺旋》第一季大结局将会在3月28日晚在Syfy电视台播出。

title: 《双螺旋》被Syfy续订第二季
